name: Haunting in New Shinjuku
description:
New Shinjuku Ghost is quick interactive fiction adventure. It sets the player in a cyberpunk future, where they must take on the roll of a Paranormal Detective in a society where technology and spirituality have been fully integrated.

The game uses a text-parser system similar to interactive fictions such as Zork. Inside each setting are key words and highlighted clues to make it easier on those new to interactive fiction.

The player must gather evidence and develop relationships to gather information vital to solving a murder, before the vengeful ghost of the victim can claim justice for herself.
